comments.author: Mother-Dick
comments.body: On paper, Dublin's transport plans are good. It's just a matter of actually getting it done.

comments.author: munkijunk
comments.body: It's for a global audience of train nerds. It's perfectly fine.

comments.author: r_Yellow01
comments.body: Irrelevant, but I am impressed by the management of IÉ. This, in contrast to the rest of Irish infrastructure.
